blogs.title: Why I love music
blogs.description: Music is among my favourite things in this world. But why do we love it so much?
blogs.text: I believe that humanity is amazing. We have invented many things, among those is music. But why? I don't know

blogs.title: Is the music industry dead?
blogs.description: With the invention of piracy, will music be able to exist for long?
blogs.text: Of course it's not on it's way damnit! New numbers show that infact, the music industry is not bigger than ever before. This is most likely due to increasing population, music streaming services and more
